title: Mini jammie dodgers
ingredients: ['110g softened butter', '50g icing sugar', '1 egg yolk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '150g plain flour', '25g cornflour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '4 tablespoons jam', 'icing sugar for dusting', '100ml whipping cream', '2 tablespoons icing sugar', '50g dark chocolate (70% cocoa)', '50g melted milk chocolate']
